```{r packages}
library(dplyr)
library(ggvis)
```
```{r load_data}
load("./data/couples_communes.Rdata")



couples_communes13 %>%
  ggvis(x = ~Nom, y = ~p, key := ~CodeInsee) %>%
  filter(Nom %in% c(eval(input_select(label = "Choississez une (ou des) communes", selected = "MARSEILLE--6E--ARRONDISSEMENT", choices = couples_communes13$Nom, multiple = TRUE, selectize = TRUE)), "Marseille", "Bouches-du-RhÃ´ne", "PACA", "France")) %>%
  mutate(Nom = factor(Nom, levels = unique(Nom))) %>%
  layer_bars(width = 0.7, fill := "#2C596F", stroke := "#2C596F") %>%
  add_tooltip(function(x) {
    if (is.null(x)) return(NULL)
    row <- couples_communes13[couples_communes13$CodeInsee == x$CodeInsee, ]
    paste0(format(row$p, digits = 2, nsmall = 1), " % des 18-74 ans sont en couple. ", collapse = "<br />")
  }) %>%
  add_axis("y", title = "% en couple") %>%
  add_axis("x", title = "")
```
